def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input().split()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = f[int(a[i])-1]

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] + f  # 0番目の要素を0にする

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = str(f[int(a[i])])

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(input().split())
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] + f  # 0番目の要素を0にする

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = str(f[int(a[i])])  # 入力された文字列を数値に変換して数値を取得

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')))
    f = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' ')))
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i]-1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    f = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i]-1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input().split()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))

    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = str(f[int(a[i])])

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
